description: Issues for migrating blog posts from old WordPress site and setting up new content structure

issues.title: [MIGRATION] Import XML Export and Inventory Blog Posts
issues.body:
## Objective

Import the WordPress XML export and create a complete inventory of all blog posts.

## Source File

XML export location: `/Users/kk/Desktop/kriskrggenerativeaitoolsamptechniques.WordPress.2026-01-03.xml`

This file needs to be:
1. Copied into the repo at `content/exports/wordpress-export-2026-01-03.xml`
2. Parsed to extract all blog posts
3. Inventory created with: title, date, URL, categories, word count

## Tasks

- [ ] Move XML export to repo
- [ ] Parse XML to extract posts
- [ ] Create inventory spreadsheet/markdown
- [ ] Count total posts
- [ ] Identify post categories
- [ ] Note posts with missing data (no featured image, etc.)

## Acceptance Criteria

- XML file in repo at `content/exports/`
- Complete inventory in `content/blog-inventory.md`
- Total post count documented
- Categories listed with post counts
- Ready for categorization phase

## Deliverables

- `content/exports/wordpress-export-2026-01-03.xml`
- `content/blog-inventory.md` with full inventory

issues.title: [MIGRATION] Define Blog Categories and Tag Taxonomy
issues.body:
## Objective

Create the category and tag structure for the new site that aligns with Kris's polymath positioning.

## Proposed Categories

| Category | Description | Maps From |
|----------|-------------|----------|
| AI & Technology | AI insights, tools, trends, future | tech posts |
| BC+AI | Community updates, Vancouver AI | community posts |
| Indigenomics | Indigenous tech sovereignty | Indigenous posts |
| The Upgrade AI | Training, democratizing AI | education posts |
| Photography | Visual work, creative process | photo posts |
| Speaking & Events | Keynotes, workshops | event posts |
| Essays | Philosophy, reflections | personal posts |

## Tasks

- [ ] Review existing categories from XML
- [ ] Map old categories to new structure
- [ ] Define category descriptions for SEO
- [ ] Create tag taxonomy (max 30 tags)
- [ ] Document category hierarchy
- [ ] Plan category landing page content

## Acceptance Criteria

- Final category list approved
- Old-to-new category mapping complete
- Tag list defined
- Category descriptions written
- Ready for WordPress implementation

## Deliverable

- `content/taxonomy-structure.md`

issues.title: [MIGRATION] Categorize and Curate Blog Posts
issues.body:
## Objective

Review all blog posts and categorize them for migration, deciding what to keep, update, archive, or retire.

## Curation Criteria

**KEEP (migrate as-is):**
- Aligns with polymath positioning
- Evergreen content still relevant
- High-quality writing
- Has engagement/traffic

**UPDATE (migrate with edits):**
- Good content but outdated
- Needs positioning adjustment
- Technical info needs refresh

**ARCHIVE (migrate but de-index):**
- Historically interesting
- No longer relevant
- Personal posts that don't fit brand

**RETIRE (don't migrate):**
- Duplicate content
- Low quality
- Completely outdated
- Contradicts current positioning

## Tasks

- [ ] Review each post against criteria
- [ ] Assign disposition: KEEP/UPDATE/ARCHIVE/RETIRE
- [ ] Assign new category
- [ ] Flag posts needing content updates
- [ ] Note posts missing featured images
- [ ] Create final migration list

## Acceptance Criteria

- Every post has disposition assigned
- Every KEEP/UPDATE post has category assigned
- Update list created for posts needing edits
- Final migration count documented

## Deliverable

- `content/blog-curation-decisions.md`

issues.title: [MIGRATION] Create URL Redirect Map
issues.body:
## Objective

Map all old URLs to new URLs to preserve SEO value and prevent 404s.

## Strategy

- 301 redirects for all migrated posts
- Category redirects if structure changes
- Page redirects (services, projects, etc.)

## Redirect Types Needed

```
# Blog Posts
/old-post-slug/ → /category/post-slug/

# Pages
/generative-ai-services/ → /services/
/recent-projects-include/ → /work/

# Categories
/category/old-category/ → /category/new-category/

# Catch-all for retired content
/retired-post/ → /blog/ (or custom 410 page)
```

## Tasks

- [ ] Extract all old URLs from XML
- [ ] Define new URL structure
- [ ] Create redirect mapping table
- [ ] Format for Redirection plugin import
- [ ] Test redirect logic
- [ ] Document any broken links

## Acceptance Criteria

- Complete redirect map in CSV/JSON format
- Ready for Redirection plugin import
- No orphaned URLs
- All old blog posts have redirect destination

## Deliverable

- `content/url-redirects.csv`

issues.title: [MIGRATION] Execute WordPress Blog Import
issues.body:
## Objective

Import blog posts into WordPress on Cloudways dev server.

## Pre-Import Checklist

- [ ] WordPress Importer plugin installed
- [ ] Categories created in WordPress
- [ ] Tags created in WordPress
- [ ] Author account (Kris Krug) exists
- [ ] Backup created

## Import Process

1. Navigate to Tools → Import → WordPress
2. Upload XML file
3. Assign posts to Kris Krug user
4. Enable 'Download and import file attachments'
5. Run import
6. Monitor for errors

## Post-Import Tasks

- [ ] Verify post count matches expected
- [ ] Check featured images imported
- [ ] Verify categories assigned correctly
- [ ] Check author attribution
- [ ] Test internal links
- [ ] Note any import errors

## Acceptance Criteria

- All KEEP/UPDATE posts imported
- Categories correctly assigned
- Featured images attached
- No critical import errors
- Import log documented

## Deliverable

- Import confirmation with count
- Error log if applicable
- `content/import-results.md`

issues.title: [MIGRATION] Post-Import Blog Cleanup
issues.body:
## Objective

Clean up imported posts and prepare for publication.

## Tasks Per Post

**Content Quality:**
- [ ] Check formatting (headers, lists, code blocks)
- [ ] Fix broken internal links
- [ ] Update external links (remove dead links)
- [ ] Verify embedded media
- [ ] Check image quality/size

**SEO:**
- [ ] Add/update meta description (Yoast)
- [ ] Review title tag
- [ ] Add focus keyword if applicable
- [ ] Check readability score

**Accessibility:**
- [ ] All images have alt text
- [ ] Heading hierarchy correct
- [ ] Link text descriptive

**Categorization:**
- [ ] Correct category assigned
- [ ] Relevant tags added (max 5 per post)
- [ ] Featured image set

## Batch Processing

Prioritize posts by traffic/importance:
1. Top 20 posts (most important)
2. Posts < 1 year old
3. Remaining posts

## Acceptance Criteria

- All migrated posts have meta descriptions
- All images have alt text
- No broken internal links
- Categories and tags assigned
- Ready for publication

## Deliverable

- Cleanup checklist per post
- `content/cleanup-status.md`

issues.title: [MIGRATION] Install and Configure Redirection Plugin
issues.body:
## Objective

Set up URL redirects to preserve SEO from old site.

## Plugin: Redirection

https://wordpress.org/plugins/redirection/

## Configuration

1. Install Redirection plugin
2. Run setup wizard
3. Enable 404 logging (temporary)
4. Import redirect CSV
5. Test sample redirects
6. Monitor 404 log

## Import Redirects

Use CSV import feature:
```csv
source,target,type
/old-url/,/new-url/,301
```

## Testing

- [ ] Test 10 random old URLs
- [ ] Verify 301 status codes
- [ ] Check redirect chains (should be single hop)
- [ ] Test category redirects
- [ ] Test page redirects

## Acceptance Criteria

- Redirection plugin installed and configured
- All redirects imported
- Sample redirects tested and working
- 404 logging active
- No redirect loops

## Deliverable

- Confirmation of redirect import
- Test results documented

issues.title: [MIGRATION] Create Blog Landing Page Design
issues.body:
## Objective

Design and build the main blog/writing page with category filtering.

## Page: /blog/ or /writing/

## Design Requirements

**Hero Section:**
- Headline: "Thoughts on Art, AI & What Comes Next"
- Subhead: Brief intro to writing
- Optional: Featured post spotlight

**Filter Bar:**
- Category filters (clickable badges)
- Search input
- View toggle (grid/list)

**Post Grid:**
- Post cards with:
  - Featured image
  - Category badge
  - Title
  - Excerpt (first 150 chars)
  - Date
  - Read time estimate
- Responsive: 3 cols desktop, 2 tablet, 1 mobile

**Pagination:**
- Load more button OR
- Numbered pagination
- 12 posts per page

## AI-Playful Elements

- Card hover: lift + subtle glow
- Category badge: gradient border
- Scroll reveal animation

## Accessibility

- Keyboard navigable filters
- Clear focus states
- Screen reader friendly
- Reduced motion support

## Acceptance Criteria

- Blog page template built
- Category filtering works
- Search functional
- Responsive design
- WCAG 2.1 AA compliant
- AI-playful aesthetic

## Deliverable

- WordPress page template
- CSS/JS for interactions

issues.title: [MIGRATION] Design Single Blog Post Template
issues.body:
## Objective

Create a beautiful, readable single post template.

## Template Structure

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ Category Badge                              │
│ POST TITLE (large, bold)                    │
│ Date · Read Time · Author                   │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│ Featured Image (full width)                 │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                             │
│ Post Content                                │
│ (optimized typography)                      │
│                                             │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│ Tags                                        │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│ Author Bio Box                              │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│ Related Posts (3)                           │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│ Comments (if enabled)                       │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│ Newsletter CTA                              │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

## Typography

- Body: 18-20px, 1.6-1.8 line height
- Max width: 720px (reading comfort)
- Headers: Clear hierarchy
- Code blocks: Monospace, syntax highlighting
- Blockquotes: Styled distinctively

## AI-Playful Elements

- Progress bar on scroll
- Subtle header image parallax
- Animated reading time
- Share buttons with hover effects

## Accessibility

- Proper heading hierarchy (h1 → h2 → h3)
- Image alt text displayed
- Link underlines visible
- High contrast text
- Focus visible on all interactive elements

## Acceptance Criteria

- Single post template built
- Beautiful, readable typography
- Related posts showing
- Author bio visible
- Mobile responsive
- WCAG 2.1 AA compliant

## Deliverable

- WordPress single.php template
- CSS for post typography

issues.title: [MIGRATION] Extract and Process Featured Images
issues.body:
## Objective

Ensure all migrated posts have optimized featured images.

## Tasks

**Extraction:**
- [ ] Identify posts with featured images in XML
- [ ] Download/copy all images
- [ ] Note posts missing featured images

**Optimization:**
- [ ] Resize to max 1920px width
- [ ] Compress (< 200KB target)
- [ ] Convert to WebP with fallback
- [ ] Generate responsive sizes

**Missing Images:**
- [ ] List posts without featured images
- [ ] Create placeholder strategy:
  - AI-generated abstract images?
  - Category-based default images?
  - Photography from portfolio?

## Image Sizes Needed

```
full: 1920 x auto
large: 1200 x auto
medium: 800 x auto
thumbnail: 400 x 300 (cropped)
card: 600 x 400 (cropped)
```

## Acceptance Criteria

- All featured images extracted and optimized
- Missing images identified
- Placeholder strategy defined
- Images uploaded to WordPress media library
- Alt text added to all images

## Deliverable

- Optimized images in `content/images/`
- Missing image report
